Very deep game, fun to play with friends. There's plays and counter-plays and loads of maps... The graphics look really nice, but it's not very hard on your graphics card. It's a great example of quality texture work. The microtransactions aren't overly intrusive, it's more like a meta-game that you can get involved with if you want. The game is totally balanced and the cosmetics have no effect on gameplay. Really can't complain.

O Counter Strike Global Offensive é um dos melhores jogos de ação que joguei até hoje. Ele é perfeito pena que a Valve parou de lançar sequencias desse jogo. Precisamos de um novo jogo do Counter Strike

Pros:
-Great game engine
-various weapons
-many maps
-Great rank system
-Fun gameplay

Cons:
-Toxic Community
-A lot of hackers / cheaters
-Playing on different server every time so the ping changes everygame
and sometimes be very high
